name: Access Control - Access Termination and Modification
description: User access rights are reviewed and modified when job responsibilities change, and access is revoked in a timely manner when employment or contract relationships are terminated. Management maintains procedures to ensure consistent execution of termination and modification processes.
objective: Ensure that user access is appropriately modified when roles change and completely revoked when individuals no longer require access, preventing unauthorized access to systems and data.
control_activities: HR notifies IT of terminations within same business day
Termination checklist ensures all access is revoked
Access is disabled immediately upon notification
Role changes trigger access review and modification
Periodic access reviews identify and remove stale accounts
Shared account credentials are changed when users leave groups
key_attributes: Timely notification of terminations to IT
Immediate access revocation for terminated employees
Regular review and cleanup of inactive accounts
evidence_requirements: Access modification records for role changes
testing_procedures: Review sample of terminations for timely access revocation
Test time between HR notification and access removal
Examine access modification for role changes
